articles.title: Choe Thae Bok meets Indonesian ambassador
Spokesman of DPRK FM on opening diplomatic ties between DPRK and Philippines
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok meets Indonesian ambassador 
      Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, met and conversed with Buchari Effendi, Indonesian ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
